short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fields of Wonder: By Daniel Barreto

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An adventurous protagonist perched on a giant leaf marvels at a vast sky, beaming moon, sparkling stars, and a newfound field stretching to the horizon. The scene captures the excitement that comes from exploring different paths in life and the realization that there is an infinite array of choices awaiting discovery. Imagine Life saying, "Hey, there's a whole universe of possibilities out there!"

Daniel Barreto (he/him) is an Artist based in MÃ©xico City, Mexico. Barreto's diverse creative talents include Animation, Film, Visuals, Murals, Music, and Design. He graduated in 2016 with a BFA degree from the School of the Museum of Fine Arts at TUFTS University in Boston, MA.
